description:
What we're doing

We’re starting a Clojure book group on Cracking the Coding Interview, going through chapter by chapter to help improve our interviewing and Clojure skills.

http://crackingthecodinginterview.com

Suggested format for the evenings

30 minutes Socialising, discussions about Clojure and interviewing, how interviewing has changed during the Covid-19 pandemic, such as interviewing remotely.
30 minutes Conversations about the interview process, behavioural questions, and system design.
1 hour of Solving interview coding questions in Clojure as a group.

How to join

The meet up is hosted on Zoom and the link to the online event is available on the event page, if you have any questions please contact us on #bristol-clojurians on the Clojurians slack.

https://clojurians.slack.com
title: Cracking the Coding Interview
